why.title: Why Vegan?
why.the_word_vegan_was_coined: The word “vegan“ was coined in 1944 by Donald Watson of the Vegan Society of the UK. This definition states:
why.veganism_is_a_way_of_living: Veganism is a way of living that seeks to exclude, as far as possible and practicable, all forms of exploitation of, and cruelty to, animals for food, clothing and any other purpose.
why.as_you_can_see_veganism_is: As you can see, veganism is not defined as a diet, but a way of living.
why.while_vegans_follow: While vegans follow an animal-free diet, they also do not wear animals or use them for entertainment or any other purpose.
why.dogs_cats_cows: Dogs, Cats, and Cows, What's the difference?
why.watch_this_video_of_a: Watch this video of a rescued cow from the For the Animals Sanctuary playing with his new ball.
